title: Did he kill a Russian nuclear executive in a plane crash to cover Clinton's corruption?
subtitle: The conspiracy theory falsely linked Moscow's deadly plane to the dismantled Uranium 1 Hillary Clinton.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Vyacheslav Ivanov, a former executive in Rosatom, was killed in a plane crash in February 2018 as part of a "deep state" conspiracy to cover corruption by Clinton.
